PBTA.description: Run games for any PbtA system in FoundryVTT!
PBTA.MoveGroupHelp: Multiple moves with the same move-group will be either/or selections when creating a new character using the character builder.
PBTA.Name: Name
PBTA.TagsHelp: (Use tab to autocomplete, commas to create new tags, and double click a tag to edit it)
PBTA.title: Powered by the Apocalypse

Dialog.Ask1: Choose a stat for this move.
Dialog.ChooseConditions: Choose all conditional modifiers that apply:
Dialog.Prompt1: Choose the modifier for this move.
Dialog.HowManyToken: How many token would you like to use?
Dialog.ErrorAboveMax: You can't spend more token than you have.

sheetConfig.attributeOptionsEmpty: must include at least one option in the 'options' group.
sheetConfig.attributeType: must be one of the following types:
sheetConfig.attributeTypeNull: doesn't have a type (may be options that had the parent renamed).
sheetConfig.equipmentTypes: is required and must have at least one equipment type.
sheetConfig.groupAttributes: must be a group of attributes.
sheetConfig.moveTypes: is required and must have at least one move type.
sheetConfig.noConfig: No sheet config has been entered.
sheetConfig.statString2: must be a string, such as "Cool"
sheetConfig.tomlError: There's a syntax error in your TOML configuration on line {line} at column {column}. See console for more details.

Migration.Begin: Applying PbtA System Migration for version {version}. Please be patient and do not close your game or shut down your server.
Migration.Complete: PbtA System Migration to version {version} completed!

stats.name: Stats
stats.hint: Enter a comma-separated list of stats/abilities, such as "Str,Dex,Con,Int,Wis,Cha"

AutoCollapseCard.name: Collapse Item Cards' Descriptions in Chat
AutoCollapseCard.hint: Automatically collapse Item Card descriptions in the Chat Log

AutoCollapseCardResult.name: Collapse Item Cards' Results in Chat
AutoCollapseCardResult.hint: Automatically collapse Item Card results in the Chat Log

advForward.name: Clear ADV/DIS After Rolls
advForward.hint: If enabled, advantage and disadvantage choices on the character sheet will be reset to normal after each roll (similar to Forward).

hideRollFormula.name: Hide roll formula
hideRollFormula.hint: Hides custom roll formula input on character sheets.

hideForward.name: Hide forward
hideForward.hint: Hides forward input on character sheets.

hideOngoing.name: Hide ongoing
hideOngoing.hint: Hides ongoing input on character sheets.

hideRollMode.name: Hide roll mode
hideRollMode.hint: Hides roll mode override (normal/advantage/disadvantage) on character sheets.

hideUses.name: Hide uses
hideUses.hint: Hides uses remaining for each move on the move's summary for characters and NPCs.

itemIcons.name: Enable Item Icons
itemIcons.hint: Enable visual icons for moves, spells, and equipment in character sheets (requires browser reload).

sheetConfig.label: Sheet Configuration
sheetConfig.name: Configure character sheets
sheetConfig.hint: Choose the data structure for character sheets, such as stats, abilities, and details.
sheetConfig.noteCancel: Cancel and prevent the changes from saving
sheetConfig.noteChangesDetected: Changes have been detected in one or more of your actor types. Review the changes below, and then choose one of the following:
sheetConfig.noteConfirmUpdateBold: NOTE: Existing data in deleted attributes will be deleted permanently
sheetConfig.notes2: You need to enter character sheet data in TOML format. Writing TOML is similar to working with .ini files common in modding settings for PC games.
sheetConfig.notes3: Read through the documentation linked below before configuring your sheet. You can also head over to the #powered-by-the-apocalypse channel of the main Foundry Virtual Tabletop Discord for questions and assistance.
sheetConfig.options: List options changed (values will be preserved):
sheetConfig.values: Value in radio list removed (value will be reset to first element):
sheetConfig.title: Sheet Configuration
sheetConfig.sheetConfigDisabledModule: Sheet configuration has been disabled due to a module that is providing it.

tagConfig.label: Tag Configuration
tagConfig.name: Configure Tags
tagConfig.hint: Choose the tags for character and items.
tagConfig.title: Configure Tags

Macro.NoActorSelected: No selected or assigned actor could be found to target with macro.
Macro.MissingTargetWarn: Your controlled actor '{actor}' does not have an item with name '{name}'.
Macro.MultipleTargetsWarn: Your controlled actor '{actor}' has more than one item with name '{name}'. The first match will be chosen.

Warnings.TagDeprecation: Tags as items have been deprecated, use the Tag Configuration menu on the game settings to create your tags.

UnlinkedToken.Equipment: Equipment cannot be rearranged while this token is not linked to an actor.
UnlinkedToken.Moves: Moves cannot be rearranged while this token is not linked to an actor.

Harm.Label: Harm
Harm.Description: When you reach 6 points of damage, you must choose (unless an Angel intervenes) one of the options on the right, then reset the damage to zero.

XP.Label: XP
XP.Description: A player scores an eXPerience point when: he or she rolls a statistic set to high; his or her Hx with someone goes from +4 to +1 or from -3 to 0; an action tells him or her to do so, whether it's one of his or her own actions, someone else's action or a personalized action. When a player completes the fifth eXPerience circle, he or she improves their character and the eXPerience bar is reset to zero.
